creator: Think Malta
descriptionHtml:
MPG REWARDS is now here! Shop for your favourite sport, fashion and pharmaceutical brands including EUROSPORT, ADIDAS, SKECHERS, DISRUPT, BATA & EUROPHARMA and get instant savings and cash vouchers.

Registered members of MPG REWARDS will benefit from a number of great advantages from all the above brand stores, including:

• Instant savings
• Loyalty points with every purchase
• Contactless identification and point redemption
• Regular offers and discount coupons
• Tracking of spending patterns and history of accumulated points
• Various discount categories

MPG REWARDS is designed for all our loyalty categories, including standard, students, sponsored clubs & fitness centres as well as business partners. Users can also check all our store locations. We look forward to offering you more value and an improved shopping experience across all our stores.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We update the MPG Rewards app regularly so we can make it better for you.

descriptionHtml:
MPG REWARDS is now here! Shop for your favourite sport, fashion and pharmaceutical brands including EUROSPORT, ADIDAS, SKECHERS, DISRUPT, BATA & EUROPHARMA and get instant savings and cash vouchers.

Registered members of MPG REWARDS will benefit from a number of great advantages from all the above brand stores, including:

• Instant savings
• Loyalty points with every purchase
• Contactless identification and point redemption
• Regular offers and discount coupons
• Tracking of spending patterns and history of accumulated points
• Various discount categories

MPG REWARDS is designed for all our loyalty categories, including standard, students, sponsored clubs & fitness centres as well as business partners. Users can also check all our store locations. We look forward to offering you more value and an improved shopping experience across all our stores.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We update this app regularly so we can make it better for you. In this version, we have made some bug fixes and stability improvements.
